001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
005
006/**
007 * Provides a set of callbacks used when iterating over node items in a directed
008 * graph.
009 * <p>
010 * The {@link AbstractNodeItemVisitor} provides an abstract implementation of
011 * this visitor pattern.
012 *
013 * @param <CONTEXT>
014 *          the type of data to pass to each visited node
015 * @param <RESULT>
016 *          the type of result produced by visitation
017 * @see AbstractNodeItemVisitor
018 */
019public interface INodeItemVisitor<CONTEXT, RESULT> {
020  /**
021   * This callback is called when the {@link IDocumentNodeItem} is visited.
022   *
023   * @param item
024   *          the visited item
025   * @param context
026   *          provides contextual information for use by the visitor
027   * @return the visitation result
028   */
029  RESULT visitDocument(@NonNull IDocumentNodeItem item, CONTEXT context);
030
031  /**
032   * This callback is called when an {@link IFlagNodeItem} is visited.
033   *
034   * @param item
035   *          the visited item
036   * @param context
037   *          provides contextual information for use by the visitor
038   * @return the visitation result
039   */
040  RESULT visitFlag(@NonNull IFlagNodeItem item, CONTEXT context);
041
042  /**
043   * This callback is called when an {@link IFieldNodeItem} is visited.
044   *
045   * @param item
046   *          the visited item
047   * @param context
048   *          provides contextual information for use by the visitor
049   * @return the visitation result
050   */
051  RESULT visitField(@NonNull IFieldNodeItem item, CONTEXT context);
052
053  /**
054   * This callback is called when an {@link IAssemblyNodeItem} is visited.
055   *
056   * @param item
057   *          the visited item
058   * @param context
059   *          provides contextual information for use by the visitor
060   * @return the visitation result
061   */
062  RESULT visitAssembly(@NonNull IAssemblyNodeItem item, CONTEXT context);
063
064  /**
065   * This callback is called when an {@link IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem} is
066   * visited.
067   *
068   * @param item
069   *          the visited item
070   * @param context
071   *          provides contextual information for use by the visitor
072   * @return the visitation result
073   */
074  RESULT visitAssembly(@NonNull IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem item, CONTEXT context);
075
076  /**
077   * This callback is called when an {@link IModuleNodeItem} is visited.
078   *
079   * @param item
080   *          the visited item
081   * @param context
082   *          provides contextual information for use by the visitor
083   * @return the visitation result
084   */
085  RESULT visitMetaschema(@NonNull IModuleNodeItem item, CONTEXT context);
086}
